concept.title: Welcome to your breakfast guide!
concept.shortdesc: Here you will find a brief introduction and what to expect from this guide.

conbody.p:
Welcome! This is your super helpful breakfast guide that will make sure you feel right at home in the kitchen. In this guide you will find:
Where to find items in the kitchen
Several recipes to make sure you are full and nourished for the day (or until lunch)!
Cleanup instructions
Troubleshooting tips
